text: Cerro Cora is a 1978 Paraguayan war movie directed by Guillermo Vera and was based on the last days of the Paraguayan War. It stars Roberto De Felice and Rosa Ros. ==Other websites== * * Cerro Cora at YouTube Category:1978 war movies Category:Paraguayan movies Category:Movies set in the 1860s Category:Movies set in Paraguay
title: Cerro Cora
